name: Garlic Parmesan Sauce
description: This is an incredibly simple garlic parmesan sauce to add to pasta, wings, pizza and more. Five minutes + five ingredients is all you need!
instructions: In a large saucepan, melt butter on medium heat. Add garlic and sauté, stirring continuously for approximately 1 minute until fragrant. Stir in salt and pepper and remove from heat. Whisk in parmesan and toss with wings, pasta, veggies, top pizza, drizzle or enjoy as a dipping sauce!
